original_text: And a very great multitude spread their garments in the way; others cut down branches from the trees, and strawed them in the way.
korean_text: 무리의 대다수는 그들의 겉옷을 길에 펴고 다른 이들은 나뭇가지를 베어 길에 펴고

sentences.original_text: And a very great multitude spread their garments in the way
sentences.korean_translation: 매우 큰 무리가 자기들의 겉옷을 길에 펐고

sentences.original_text: others cut down branches from the trees
and strawed them in the way
